title: Lia's Pizzeria Cucina Italiana menu - Oceanside NY 11572 - (516) 764-4971
text: Own this business? Learn more about offering online ordering to your diners. Lia's Pizzeria Cucina Italiana Mussels, baked clams, eggplant rollatini, shrimp, and potato croquet. Serves 2. Fried calamari. 6 whole Littleneck baked clams. Mussels in marinara sauce or garlic and wine. In a spicy marinara sauce. Spicy. Fresh mozzarella served with roasted peppers and tomatoes, topped with balsamic vinaigrette over lettuce. Served with marinara sauce. 5 tender strips served with honey mustard or ketchup and french fries. 6 fried mozzarella sticks served with marinara sauce. 6 pieces. 10 pieces. Lettuce, tomato, feta cheese, Kalamata olives, roasted peppers, cucumber and red onions served with oil and vinegar. Mesculin greens, olives, chopped tomato, roasted peppers and fresh mozzarella served with our house dressing. Lettuce, tomato, olives, onions, mozzarella cheese and fried chicken. Lettuce, tomato, cucumbers, carrots and onions. Mesculin greens, chopped tomato, artichoke hearts, Gorgonzola cheese and walnuts with a raspberry vinaigrette. With lettuce, tomato, shredded mozzarella, fried chicken with honey mustard dressing. With lettuce, tomato, onion, grilled chicken and honey mustard dressing. Ham, pepperoni, sausage, salami and mozzarella. 5 pieces. Menu for Lia's Pizzeria Cucina Italiana provided by Allmenus.com DISCLAIMER: Information shown may not reflect recent changes.
